text: District Election Officer Sajjansingh R. Chavan has asked licence-holders of arms and ammunition to surrender their weapons immediately as per directions of the Election Commission of India (ECI). In a release, Mr. Chavan said that the district administration had invoked Section 144 of the CrPC banning possession and carrying of weapons. Owners of such weapons were directed to hand over their weapons to the nearest police station and collect an acknowledgement receipt. The weapons would be returned to them after the end of the elections, the release said.
title: Licence-holders told to surrender weapons
